name: modern-shopify-theme
description: Modern Shopify Theme Pro - High-performance theme for Shopify stores

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:js" "shopify theme dev"
scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:performance && npm run test:accessibility
scripts.test:lint: echo 'Liquid linting...' && echo 'No liquid linter configured yet'
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && shopify theme push --store=$DEV_STORE
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && shopify theme push --store=$STAGING_STORE
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && shopify theme push --store=$PRODUCTION_STORE --live
scripts.deploy: npm run build-css-prod && npx shopify theme push
scripts.package: npm run build && shopify theme package
scripts.format: echo 'Formatting files...' && echo 'Prettier not configured yet'
